markdown:
Elemental hurricanes embody the ferocity of violent windstorms. **[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 28 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23 [Elemental Hurricane](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2976) **Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 141 1.1 **Perception** +20; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59) **Languages** [Sussuran](/Languages.aspx?ID=111) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +24, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +21, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +22 **Str** +6 **Dex** +7 **Con** +4 **Int** +0 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +0 --- **AC** 32 **Fort** +19 **Ref** +24 **Will** +18 **HP** 140 **Immunities** bleed, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=696) **High Winds** ([air](/Traits.aspx?ID=527), [aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=542)) 40 feet. Air within the emanation is [difficult terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) for [Flying](/Actions.aspx?ID=2312) creatures that don't have the [air](/Traits.aspx?ID=527) trait.
**Disperse** ([air](/Traits.aspx?ID=527)) **Trigger** The elemental hurricane takes damage from a hostile action; **Effect** The elemental hurricane disperses. Until the end of the current turn, it can't be attacked or targeted, doesn't take up space, and its high winds aura is suppressed. At the end of the turn, the elemental hurricane reforms in any unoccupied space within 100 feet of where it dispersed, and its high winds are restored. --- **Speed** fly 100 feet; swiftness **Melee** gust +24 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d10+12 bludgeoning plus [Push](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=47) 10 feet **Ranged** lightning lash +24 ([range increment 75 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 2d12+6 electricity **Gale Breath** ([Air](/Traits.aspx?ID=5)) The elemental exhales a 30-foot cone of air. Creatures in the cone must succeed at a DC 29 Fortitude save or be [knocked away](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) from the elemental. A creature knocked into a solid object stops moving and takes 10d6 bludgeoning damage (roll the damage once for all creatures). The elemental hurricane can't use Gale Breath again for 1d4 rounds.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature is pushed 20 feet.
**Failure** The creature is pushed 40 feet.
**Critical Failure** The creature is pushed 40 feet and knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=88). **Swiftness** The elemental's movement doesn't trigger reactions.
name: Elemental Hurricane

Disperse Reaction (air) Trigger The elemental hurricane takes damage from a hostile action; Effect The elemental hurricane disperses. Until the end of the current turn, it can't be attacked or targeted, doesn't take up space, and its high winds aura is suppressed. At the end of the turn, the elemental hurricane reforms in any unoccupied space within 100 feet of where it dispersed, and its high winds are restored. --- Speed fly 100 feet; swiftness Melee Single Action gust +24 (Finesse, reach 20 feet), Damage 2d10+12 bludgeoning plus Push 10 feet Ranged Single Action lightning lash +24 (range increment 75 feet), Damage 2d12+6 electricity Gale Breath Two Actions (Air) The elemental exhales a 30-foot cone of air. Creatures in the cone must succeed at a DC 29 Fortitude save or be knocked away from the elemental. A creature knocked into a solid object stops moving and takes 10d6 bludgeoning damage (roll the damage once for all creatures). The elemental hurricane can't use Gale Breath again for 1d4 rounds.
